name: Imbuement of Sorcery
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
The touched mage weapon overflows with arcane power. Its next attack within the duration can target a number of additional creatures equal to your spellcasting stat, and it deals an additional 2d6 arcane damage to all creatures targeted, hit or miss. If a weapon style is used, only one target is affected by any effects from that style's attack.

Casting this spell on a weapon ends any other spells affecting that weapon.
empower: Removes the AP cost on this spell.
